meanings.sent1: The letter was handwritten with care.
meanings.sent2: I prefer handwritten notes over typed ones.
meanings.sent3: His handwritten signature looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The handwritten message on the card warmed her heart.
meanings.sent5: The handwritten recipe was passed down for generations.

meanings.sent1: The document had a handwritten note in the margin.
meanings.sent2: She recognized his handwritten style immediately.
meanings.sent3: The handwritten label on the jar made her smile.
meanings.sent4: The handwritten message on the wall was a mystery to solve.
meanings.sent5: The handwritten invitation added a personal touch to the event.
